name: Send A Smile Note Cards - Quinton The Quail
description:
Guaranteed to bring a smile to anyone’s face, Send A Smile™ note cards are the perfect way to stay in touch with loved ones, to show your gratitude, or just to say hello.

Features:
* six folded cards (4.25 x 5.5") + 6 envelope (A2)
* blank inside for personal note
* printed offset using soy inks & a recycled stock
* packaged in a cello sleeve w/signature label

--------------------------------------------

Designed & Illustrated by me (Ashley).
© Ashley Giessing | Isabell's Umbrella™

name: Snail Mail Compendium - Twelve Month Subscription
description:
Born from a love of snail-mail and paper goods of all kinds, we are delighted to announce, Snail Mail Compendium, a monthly subscription service now available at Isabell’s Umbrella!

Lovingly curated with a collection of Isabell’s Umbrella goodies, each month your box will contain delightful handpicked items such as: greeting and thank you cards, notebooks, adorable magnets, bookmarks, stationary and products exclusively designed for subscription members. Carefully packaged and shipped straight to you, we make it easy to give year-long gifts, or to treat yourself with a little bit of happiness each month.

PLAN: 12 Months - $170/Prepaid

- A splendid selection of paper goods and other spiffy surprises

- 15% off all orders placed during your subscription period

- A special gift for you during the month of your birthday

- Exclusive magnet set


*Pricing above includes shipping for US orders. International orders, add an additional $36 for the 12 month subscription. Orders will be shipped the first week of each month via First Class Mail.
